Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Romantic Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main characters, Nan and Cal, and sets up the initial conflicts around romance, work, and the symbolic 'ghost town'. It spans the initial pages and establishes Nan's stubborn personality and the contrasting perspectives on the ghost town.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Romantic Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Nan in a saloon setting, rejecting romantic advances and prioritizing her work, setting the stage for her independent and strong-willed character.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and the Stubborn Woman

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Solo Journey and Reflections
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's decision to go to the ghost town alone and her internal thoughts about her past visits, highlighting her independent nature and weariness of the ghost town.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Reflections on the Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Modernization and Emotional Impact
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to the modern reality and the threat to the ghost town from an airport project. It explores the emotional impact of this modernization, particularly on Nan, and introduces a new conflict beyond personal relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Modern Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the modern setting and the news of the airport project, contrasting with the previous Western scenes and setting up the conflict of modernization vs. preservation.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Fallout and Distress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate emotional reactions to the airport announcement, culminating in Nan's distress and highlighting her deep connection to the ghost town.

narrative_arcs.title: Disbelief, Explanation, and Nan's Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Reconciliation and Confrontation with Modernization
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the resolution of Nan and Cal's romantic conflict and Nan's direct confrontation with the destruction of the ghost town. It shows Nan's emotional journey from personal frustration to active resistance against modernization.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the romantic tension between Nan and Cal, leading to a reconciliation and a more amicable understanding between them.

sub_scenes.title: Direct Confrontation with Demolition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's arrival at the ghost town and her dismay at its transformation, leading to a direct confrontation with the construction workers.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Arrival at the Transformed Ghost Town and Dismay

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflict and Emotional Breakdown
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the conflict between Nan and her father regarding the airport project and her feelings, leading to an emotional breakdown and highlighting the generational and personal struggles.

sub_scenes.title: Business Justification and Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the justification of the airport project from a business perspective and Nan's father dismissing her concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Labor and Escalating Argument
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene intensifies the conflict by introducing the demand for Nan to help with horses and escalating the argument with her father, leading to threats and emotional distress.

Major_Arcs.title: Parental Perspectives and Nan's Resolve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents the contrasting perspectives of Nan's parents on her situation and Cal, ultimately leading to Nan's resolve to understand her feelings for Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Parental Advice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the contrasting reactions of Nan's mother and father to her distress, offering different views on love and courtship.

sub_scenes.title: Maid's Encouragement and Nan's Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the maid who offers encouragement and a different perspective on Cal, prompting Nan to decide to seek clarity about her feelings.

Major_Arcs.title: Forced Duty and Defiance Leading to Confession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Nan's forced duty with horses and her continued defiance, leading to a direct confession of her feelings to Cal amidst the imposed labor.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Horse Duty and Initial Defiance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan being instructed to help with horses and her initial defiant reaction to the forced labor.

narrative_arcs.title: Yore Dad's Deal and No Backing Down

sub_scenes.title: Confession and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan's confession of feelings to Cal and his explanation of his actions, leading to a moment of vulnerability and misunderstanding.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts from personal conflicts to a larger environmental crisis - a severe snowstorm, which paradoxically leads to a romantic resolution between Nan and Cal amidst community hardship and unexpected aid.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Weather Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts continued tension between Nan and Cal alongside initial warnings about worsening weather conditions.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Defensiveness in the Snow
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst the Storm

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Rescue, and Romantic Recognition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves from despair about the snowstorm to the unexpected arrival of aid and culminates in the romantic resolution between Nan and Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Waking Up to Snow and Hopelessness
The Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Fodder Drop
Joyful Recognition of Fodder and Cal's Foresight

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character, Chane Benson, and shifts the setting to town, focusing on initial reactions to Chane and setting up new conflicts and character dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Action and Town Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through an action scene and depicts the varied reactions of townspeople to his presence and actions.

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff, Sally, and Clyde - Family and Gun Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new characters Jeff, Sally, and Clyde, focusing on family dynamics, gun violence, and emerging conflicts around Jeff's behavior and influences.

sub_scenes.title: Reflections on Jeff's Past and Brother
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides background on Jeff's past and his brother, setting up the context for Jeff's current behavior and Sally's concerns.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Jeff's Brother and Past

sub_scenes.title: Gun Confrontation and Rebellious Attitude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a direct confrontation about Jeff handling a gun and his defiant, rebellious attitude, escalating tension.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Fear and Plea to Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Sally expressing her deep fear and concern about Jeff to Clyde and seeking his help to guide Jeff away from a dangerous path.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Fear and Plea to Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Sally's Confrontation with Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Jeff's disappearance and Sally's confrontation with Mr. Benson, adding new layers of conflict and mystery.

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper Article and Escalating Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a newspaper article and its repercussions, escalating conflicts between Clyde, Sally, and Benson, leading to personal and professional tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Discussion of Article and Warning to Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the newspaper article and shows initial reactions, including a warning to Clyde about its potential negative impact.

narrative_arcs.title: Defense of Past Actions and Article Mention
Warning about Benson and the Article

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Confrontation with Clyde and Benson's Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally's angry confrontation with Clyde about the article and her subsequent interaction with Benson, where he explains his motives.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Journalistic Stance and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene further elaborates on Benson's journalistic duty and culminates in a dinner invitation from Sally, setting up a potential interaction between various characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Article's Impact and Doubts about Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Mistaken Identity and Escalating Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on escalating conflicts arising from mistaken identity and romantic tensions, leading to physical altercations and urgent actions.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Moonlit Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the dinner invitation and a subsequent moonlit encounter, possibly hinting at developing romantic tensions or misdirection.

sub_scenes.title: Mistaken Identity and Aggressive Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Sally realizing a case of mistaken identity during an aggressive encounter, leading to a major plot twist.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Physical Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jeff's jealousy and a physical fight with Chane, further escalating the conflict and leading to Sally's urgent action.

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Legacy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Chane Benson storyline, focusing on the resolution of the conflict, romantic reconciliation, and establishing a legacy in journalism.

sub_scenes.title: Challenge, Anxious Wait, and Headline Change
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the challenge for a fair fight, the anxious wait for its outcome, and the subsequent headline change signaling a resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Challenge for a Fair Fight and Anxious Wait

sub_scenes.title: Printing the Clarion and Family Legacy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the narrative by showing the printing of the newspaper and reflecting on family legacy and values, providing a sense of closure.

narrative_arcs.title: Printing the Clarion and Family Legacy

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Betsy and Range War Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new characters like Betsy and Steve Daley, shifting focus to a range war conflict and setting up new tensions and power dynamics in a Western setting.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Western Fight and Steve Daley's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a Western fight scene and introduces Steve Daley as the new 'boss', setting up new conflicts and character introductions.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley as 'The Boss'
Discussion of Betsy's Ranch and Approaching Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Clarification of Steve Daley's Role and Range War Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies Steve Daley's role and introduces growing concerns about an impending range war, setting up tensions and conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarifying Steve Daley's Role and Concerns
Discussion of Impending Range War and Local Troubles
Offer of a Ride and Acceptance
Hank's Orders and Waiting for Dress Material

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Rising Tension
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on direct confrontations and rising tensions related to the range war, leading to physical altercations and setting up further conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Purchase Meeting and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a post-purchase meeting and an immediate confrontation, escalating tensions and leading to physical violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Purchase Conversation and Steve Daley Mention
Discussion of Steve Daley's Abilities and Impending Danger

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy's Strategy and Personnel Changes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Betsy's strategic decisions regarding hiring Steve Daley and managing her ranch amidst the rising tensions, showing her leadership and philosophy.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Hire Bodyguard and Ranch Philosophy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Betsy's decision to hire Steve Daley as a bodyguard and elaborates on her ranch management philosophy, showcasing her strategic thinking.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Hire Bodyguard and Ranch Philosophy
Clarification on Firing and Stance Against Gunslingers
Gratitude, Personnel Change, and Hank Yuh's Request

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Conflict and Resolution - Betsy and Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic conflict between Betsy and Steve regarding his gunslinger lifestyle and culminates in a resolution with Steve surrendering his guns for love.

sub_scenes.title: Job Reassurance and Gun Condition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the romantic conflict with Betsy setting a condition for Steve's employment related to his guns.

narrative_arcs.title: Love's Proof and Surrender of Guns

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Range War and Hank's Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalation of the range war conflict, leading to direct confrontations and a significant event - Hank's ambush and capture.

sub_scenes.title: Ominous Warning and Trespassing Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets an ominous tone and introduces direct accusations of trespassing, escalating the tension and foreshadowing conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of War and Betsy's Authority

Major_Arcs.title: Steve's Defiance and Rescue Attempt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Steve's defiance against Betsy's wishes and his resolve to rescue Hank, leading to a tense confrontation and escalating danger.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Plea and Steve's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's desperate attempts to dissuade Steve and his unwavering resolve to go to Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Aftermath and Suspense at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Romantic Reunion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the events at Devil's Pass, shifting between past context and present confrontation, leading to a reunion and romantic resolution amidst danger.

sub_scenes.title: Context and Accusations at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides context to the conflict at Devil's Pass and sets up the immediate confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Romantic Affirmation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the reunion of Betsy and Steve and their emotional affirmations amidst the aftermath of the conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Mary, Dave, and Curley - New Romantic and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new characters Mary, Dave, and Curley, setting up new romantic tensions and ranch-related conflicts, moving away from Betsy and Steve's storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Mary's Confrontation and Curley's Suspicious Activity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Mary through a confrontation and sets up suspicion around Curley's unusual actions on the ranch.

Major_Arcs.title: Fence Dispute and Escalating Tension
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a fence dispute, introducing new characters and escalating tension through misunderstandings and threats of violence.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Complaint and Arrival at Fence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the fence complaint and shows the characters riding out to the fence, setting up a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpected Visitors and Accusation of Fence Damage

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Fred's Reappearance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a romantic interlude between Dave and Carrie following the fence dispute, but it is abruptly interrupted by Fred Gordon's reappearance, hinting at unresolved conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Immediate Aftermath and Romantic Shift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of the fence confrontation, leading to a romantic shift between Dave and Carrie.

narrative_arcs.title: Confusion about Friendship and Second Chances
Romantic Interlude and Dismissal of Conflict

Major_Arcs.title: Miss Bronson, Fred, Dave - Romantic Entanglements
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic entanglements of Miss Bronson, Fred Gordon, and Dave, revealing complex feelings and developing romantic overtures.

sub_scenes.title: Conversation about Dave and Confession of Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a conversation about Dave and Miss Bronson's confession of love for Fred Gordon, revealing complex romantic dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love for Fred Gordon
Desire to Bury the Hatchet and Romantic Overture
Flashback to Romantic Words and Proposal

Major_Arcs.title: Carlton Contract and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the Carlton contract and reveals deception and betrayal in the romantic and business relationships, leading to emotional fallout.

sub_scenes.title: Discussion of Contract and Fred's Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the discussion of the Carlton contract and Fred's realization of its importance for his and Carrie's future.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Dave and the Carlton Contract

Major_Arcs.title: Carlton Office Confrontation and Resolution (Carrie & Fred)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the confrontation at Carlton's office and the apparent resolution of the conflict between Carrie and Fred, though with lingering emotional fallout.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Confrontation at Carlton's Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Fred's arrival at Carlton's office and the initial confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Confrontation at Carlton's Office

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Fred, and Dave - Emotional Closure and New Beginnings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on emotional closure for Carrie, Fred, and Dave, leading to Carrie's indirect confession and setting up new romantic trajectories.

sub_scenes.title: Regret and Dave's Encounter with Carrie
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie's regret and her encounter with Dave, setting up a new phase in their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Inquiry about Feelings for Fred
Wagon Ride and Direct Confrontation about Love

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Resolution and New Conflict - Carrie and Fred, Dirk's Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the romantic conflict between Carrie and Fred, leading to reconciliation and a marriage proposal, but it also introduces a new conflict with Dirk's unexpected return and injury.

sub_scenes.title: Illness, Revelation, and Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's illness, the revelation about the beef contract, and the romantic reconciliation with Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: The Beef Contract Revelation and Reconciliation with Fred

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Urgent Plea and Secret Meeting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new conflict with Dirk's urgent plea and a secret meeting, disrupting the romantic resolution and setting up new dangers.

narrative_arcs.title: Dirk's Urgent Arrival and Plea for Help
The Secret Meeting and Dirk's Disguise
Dirk's Gunshot Wound and Medical Examination

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Trouble and Ransom's Arrival
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation into Dirk's situation and the arrival of Marshal Ransom, escalating tensions and setting up a legal and personal conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation into Dirk's Situation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial investigation into Dirk's trouble and the decision to go to town for answers.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Investigation into Dirk's Situation
Marshal Ransom's Arrival and Inquiry about Dirk
Confrontation with Rance Cready and Suspicion at the Ranch

Major_Arcs.title: Legal Confrontation and Negotiation (Dirk and Ransom)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the legal confrontation between Marshal Ransom and Dirk's allies, leading to negotiation and a conditional agreement regarding Dirk's fate.

sub_scenes.title: Legal Stance and Plea for Leniency
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial legal confrontation with Marshal Ransom asserting his duty and the subsequent plea for leniency for Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Reflection and Night Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the woman's internal reflection on Dirk's situation and a nighttime encounter with Marshal Ransom, hinting at a deeper connection.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Confession and Escape Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic development between Chris and Ransom amidst the Dirk situation, leading to a confession of love and a controversial escape plan.

sub_scenes.title: Heated Argument and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a heated argument that transitions into a romantic confession between Chris and Marshal Ransom.

sub_scenes.title: Escape Plan Proposal and Conspiracy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the escape plan proposal from Chris and Ransom's seeming agreement, setting up a conspiracy to aid Dirk's escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape Plan Proposal and Seeming Agreement

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit, Gunfight, and Moral Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the action of pursuit, a violent gunfight, and introduces a moral dilemma concerning the fate of the injured Marshal.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Failed Evasion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the pursuit and details the characters' failed attempts to evade capture.

sub_scenes.title: Gunfight and Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the direct confrontation leading to a gunfight and Chris's injury.

Major_Arcs.title: Escape and Romantic Climax (Chris and Ransom)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dirk's escape and focuses on Chris's decision to return to Ransom, leading to a romantic climax and resolution for their relationship amidst the ongoing conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Chris's Return Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk's escape and Chris's unexpected decision to return to Ransom, turning away from the escape plan.

Major_Arcs.title: Recovery, Confession, and Wedding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Chris and Ransom storyline, focusing on Ransom's recovery, a mutual confession of love, and culminates in their marriage, providing a happy resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Ransom's Recovery and Initial Interaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Ransom's recovery and his initial interaction with Chris upon regaining consciousness.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the wedding day preparations and the dramatic interruption by Dirk, creating last-minute suspense.
